Title: Relates to prohibiting agreements between employers that directly restrict the current or future employment of any employee
Summary: Prohibits agreements between employers that directly restrict the current or future employment of any employee; allows for a cause of action against employers who engage in such agreements.
LawCode: Add ยง5-338, Gen Ob L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general obligations law, in relation to prohibiting agreements between employers that directly restrict the current or future employment of any employee
